services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Personalized solutions for every type of need

buySell.title: Buy & Sell
buySell.description: Premium car buying and selling service with competitive prices and realistic valuations to offer you the best possible service whether you buy or sell and trade in your old vehicle as part of the payment. We want to be your best consultancy for both selling and buying.

salesManagement.title: Sales Management
salesManagement.description: Complete management of your vehicle sale process. We handle all necessary procedures from the beginning of the process to the formalization of the sale. We offer to manage the sale of your car whether in person or if you want to continue enjoying your vehicle while we sell it.

importExport.title: Import/Export
importExport.description: We are specialists in both importing and exporting your vehicle. If for any reason your choice is not viable at the national level, we find the best solution for your needs at the European level with all necessary guarantees. We also facilitate the management of selling your vehicle abroad if this is the best sales option.

vehicleStorage.title: Vehicle Custody
vehicleStorage.description: We custody your vehicle safely and professionally. Our premium storage service includes regular maintenance checks, battery conditioning, and comprehensive insurance coverage for complete peace of mind.

financing.title: Financing
financing.description: Flexible financing solutions tailored to the purchase of all types of vehicles. We work with premium financial institutions to offer competitive rates, leasing options, and bespoke payment plans that suit your financial requirements.

renting.title: Renting
renting.description: We offer personalized advice on the best options available in the Renting market, whether for personal or professional use. Compare and choose the option that best suits your needs.

who.title: Who We Are
who.alfonsoBio: With over 15 years of experience in the luxury automotive industry, Alfonso brings unparalleled expertise and passion for premium motorcars. His commitment to excellence ensures every client finds their perfect match.
who.victorBio: Víctor's extensive background in automotive sales and customer service has made him a trusted adviser for luxury motorcar enthusiasts. His attention to detail and personalised approach guarantee exceptional service.

what.title: Our Quality Promise
what.description: We provide top-quality luxury motorcars and exceptional service to discerning clients. Our curated selection of BMW and Mercedes vehicles represents the pinnacle of automotive excellence.

policy.title: Our Commitment to Excellence
policy.description: Every vehicle in our collection is totally revised, certified, verified and comes with a premium warranty. This is our unwavering commitment to excellence and the foundation of how we conduct business. We believe that luxury extends beyond the vehicle itself—it encompasses the entire ownership experience, from the moment you step into our showroom to years of worry-free driving.
policy.revisedDesc: Comprehensive mechanical and aesthetic inspection by certified technicians
policy.certifiedDesc: Official certification meeting the highest industry standards
policy.verifiedDesc: Complete history verification and authenticity confirmation
policy.warrantyDesc: Extensive coverage for complete peace of mind
